case.title: Just don't be fake! - 32 (London)
case.text: Hello all, I am writing this add to see if any thing comes of it don't try don't know! Me well I like films ,art, dance , out door thing and music along with a good deal of many other things! You well if you could send a pic I will send back but if not its fine .must be funny and smart and faithful don't care If your rich or poor or what you do as a job I also work . I have two children which I don't have a problem with but if you don't reply then simple as!. 27/34 only please as I am 32. Thanks Lilly
